overview: Aften Opal, a school reporter, arrives at Nikole Nash's house to do a profile on her. Aften seems especially earnest, which surprises Nikole because she's not sure why the school newspaper is doing a piece on her -- she's nothing special. But Aften insists that since Nikole is out as a lesbian in a small town, it's important to hear her voice!
title: Inquiring Minds
